text:
BOSTON UNIVERSITY
To: i*tr
From:
Subject: Attached letters
December 13, 19!?!?
Attached is letter you dictated to be sent
to all those whose membership is in serious
arrears. It appears to me to be a wholly
negative statement. While I realize that you
want these people to pay tip or get out, I
still feel that the immediate reaction would
be to say "to hell with itlw
Therefore, stiggest a substitute letter, similar
to the suggested one attached, which still
contains the same statement about cancellation of
membership within thirty days, but also suggests
that the individual might be missing something
if he werenft to remit but fast.
f'J J
Om
